Java.Lang
class Boolean








class Boolean

The Boolean class wraps a value of the primitive type
boolean in an object. 
An object of type
Boolean contains a single field whose type is
boolean.


In addition, this class provides many methods for
converting a boolean to a String and a
String to a boolean, as well as other
constants and methods useful when dealing with a
boolean.







Since: 
JDK1.0


Author: 
Arthur van Hoff









 








Property Summary






public static  Boolean
FALSE


          The Boolean object corresponding to the primitive
value false.		






public static  Boolean
TRUE


          The Boolean object corresponding to the primitive
value true.		






public static  Class
TYPE


          The Class object representing the primitive type boolean.		









 








Constructor Summary





Boolean(string s)


          Allocates a Boolean object representing the value
true if the string argument is not null
and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true".






Boolean(bool value)


          Allocates a Boolean object representing the
value argument.











 








Method Summary






public  bool
BooleanValue()


          Returns the value of this Boolean object as a boolean
primitive.		






public static  int
Compare(bool x, bool y)


          Compares two boolean values.







public static  bool
GetBoolean(string name)


          Returns true if and only if the system property
named by the argument exists and is equal to the string
"true". 		






public static  int
HashCode(bool value)


          Returns a hash code for a boolean value; compatible with
Boolean.hashCode().		






public static  bool
LogicalAnd(bool a, bool b)


          Returns the result of applying the logical AND operator to the
specified boolean operands.		






public static  bool
LogicalOr(bool a, bool b)


          Returns the result of applying the logical OR operator to the
specified boolean operands.		






public static  bool
LogicalXor(bool a, bool b)


          Returns the result of applying the logical XOR operator to the
specified boolean operands.		






public static  bool
ParseBoolean(string s)


          Parses the string argument as a boolean.  		






public static  string
ToString(bool b)


          Returns a String object representing the specified
boolean.  		






public static  Boolean
ValueOf(string s)


          Returns a Boolean with a value represented by the
specified string.  		






public static  Boolean
ValueOf(bool b)


          Returns a Boolean instance representing the specified
boolean value.
